**兽人盾**（orcish shield）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观为**红眼盾**（red-eyed shield）。

[ ]

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人盾[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

兽人族的角色在游戏开始时若会获得小盾牌，则改为获得一面[兽人盾](/wiki/%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E7%9B%BE "兽人盾")。不过，游戏中所有开局时携带小盾牌的职业都无法选择兽人作为起始种族，因此该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

[魔多兽人](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E5%A4%9A%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔多兽人 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄3的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一面兽人盾。[兽人队长](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E9%98%9F%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人队长 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄2的概率携带与魔多兽人相同的初始防具，因此它们有1⁄6的概率在生成时携带兽人盾[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 描述

兽人盾的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1。

## 策略

- *主条目：[盾牌#策略](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5 "盾牌")*

兽人盾的AC加成和[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")相同，但是更重，而且对[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")的惩罚更高，你可以用它作为临时过渡用防具，但最好及时替换成更好的盾牌。

部分玩家会将兽人盾用在[非官方的种族防具行为](/index.php?title=%E9%9D%9E%E5%AE%98%E6%96%B9%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "非官方行为 (page does not exist)")中。

## 历史

兽人盾最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Sauron](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sauron "wikipedia:Sauron")***

在[J. R. R. 托尔金](/index.php?title=J._R._R._%E6%89%98%E5%B0%94%E9%87%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "J. R. R. 托尔金 (page does not exist)")的奇幻小说《魔戒》系列中，“红眼”是黑暗魔君索隆的标志。索隆麾下的兽人大军的盾牌上均有红眼的标志——但萨鲁曼的[强兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%BA%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "强兽人 (page does not exist)")大军除外。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orcish_shield/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants may further distinguish the orcish and Uruk-hai shields, and others give [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)") (including orcish characters) an AC bonus for wearing orcish shields.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), orcish shields can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") into [elven shields](/wiki/Elven_shield "Elven shield"), and upgrading an elven shield produces either an orcish shield or an Uruk-hai shield, with an equal chance of each item.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), orcish shields grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), an orcish shield grants 1 AC and 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") when worn. Like all shields, orcish shields add their full enchantment to AC while giving no bonus to DR.

[The Shield of the All-Seeing](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Shield_of_the_All-Seeing "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") orcish shield that favors orcs and can be enchanted to +7. While worn, it grants [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") along with [searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching"), adds its enchantment as a bonus to search attempts, and warns of [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)") and [minions](/wiki/Minion "Minion"). [Invoking](/wiki/Invoking "Invoking") the artifact cures [blindness](/wiki/Blindness "Blindness") and [hallucination](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination"), and grants [blindness](/wiki/Blindness_resistance "Blindness resistance") and [hallucination resistance](/wiki/Hallucination_resistance "Hallucination resistance"), [protection from shape changers](/wiki/Protection_from_shape_changers "Protection from shape changers"), and [x-ray vision](/wiki/X-ray_vision "X-ray vision") for 30 turns (or 40 if your base race is an orc).

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), orcish shields do not count as bulky for purposes of spellcasting penalties, while Uruk-hai shields do.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), orcish shields grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including orcish characters. Orcish [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight") start each game with an orcish shield.

[Goblin outriders](/wiki/Goblin_outrider "Goblin outrider") and [goblin-captains](/wiki/Goblin-captain "Goblin-captain") have a 1⁄3 chance of generating with an orcish shield, and various [orcish](/wiki/Racial_monster "Racial monster") [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") may generate with an orcish shield.

An orcish shield can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining [orcish boots](/wiki/Orcish_boots "Orcish boots") and an [orcish helm](/wiki/Orcish_helm "Orcish helm"). Orcish shields can be used to forge a few items:

- An orcish shield can be combined with [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail") to create [orcish chain mail](/wiki/Orcish_chain_mail "Orcish chain mail").
- An orcish shield can be combined with an orcish helm to create [orcish ring mail](/wiki/Orcish_ring_mail "Orcish ring mail").
- Two orcish shields can be combined to create an Uruk-hai shield.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), orcish shields grant +1 AC to orcish monsters that wear them, including player orcs.

Upgrading an orcish shield will produce a [dwarvish roundshield](/wiki/Dwarvish_roundshield "Dwarvish roundshield"), and vice versa.
